content.text: Myeloproliferative neoplasms and myelodysplastic syndromes are diseases of the blood cells and bone marrow. Sometimes both conditions are present. Explore the links on this page to learn about their treatment, research, and clinical trials.
The information in this section is meant to help you cope with the many issues and concerns that occur when you have cancer.

National Cancer Institute
at the National Institutes of Health
